name: resonote
description: AI-powered audio and video transcription tool

scripts.vercel-build: mkdir -p public && cd web-client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r web-client/dist public/web && cp -n *.html public/ && cp -n *.css public/ && cp -r assets public/ && cp -r icons public/ && cp -r images public/ && cp script.js public/ && cp account.js public/ && cp download.js public/ && cp payment.js public/

author: Resonote
